sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import '../styles/elementCard.css' function ElementCard({selectedElement}) { return (

{selectedElement.atomicNumber}

{selectedElement.symbol}

{selectedElement.name}

{selectedElement.atomicMass}

Atomic radius:

{selectedElement.atomicRadius}

Boiling point:

{selectedElement.boilingPoint}

Melting point:

{selectedElement.meltingPoint}

Standard state:

{selectedElement.standardState}

Oxidation states:

{selectedElement.oxidationStates}

Electron affinity:

{selectedElement.electronAffinity}

Ionization energy:

{selectedElement.ionizationEnergy}

Electron negativity:

{selectedElement.electronegativity}

Van der waals radius

{selectedElement.vanDerWaalsRadius}

Electronic configuration

{selectedElement.electronicConfiguration}
); } export default ElementCard;
